definition: to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish
few/less/to lack/to be missing/to stop (doing sth)/seldom

pinyin: fa1 re4 ban4 xue4 xiao3 ban3 jian3 shao3 zong1 he2 zheng1
containing_words.word: 发热伴血小板减少综合征

sentences.english: Smart software can also reduce medical errors.
sentences.chinese: 高智能的软体也可以减少医疗疏失。

sentences.english: He self-reflected and decided to decrease the stress and clean up his diet, looking beyond the status quo.
sentences.chinese: 他能自我反醒并决定减少压力和调整饮食，改变现状。

sentences.english: They're less likely to nitpick about details that aren't relevant at this stage.
sentences.chinese: 减少他们在与主题不相关的细节上的吹毛求疵。

sentences.english: I'm using exactly the same form to reduce this.
sentences.chinese: 我用的同样的方法来减少问题的规模。

sentences.english: The existing vaccines can only reduce the amount of virus, rather than totally inactivating it.
sentences.chinese: 当前的疫苗只会减少病毒数量，并非真正杀灭病毒。

sentences.english: This reduces the complexity of our work and offers run time performance improvements.
sentences.chinese: 这减少了工作的复杂性，并可以提供运行时性能改进。

sentences.english: Memory allocation failures should reduce the use of this flag.
sentences.chinese: 如果内存分配失败过多，应该减少这个标记的使用。

sentences.english: There are two ways to solve supply and demand contradiction.
sentences.chinese: 解决供需矛盾可从两个方面着手，首先是减少需求。

sentences.english: Increased positive feelings and reduced feelings of anxiety, anger and sadness.
sentences.chinese: 增加正面的工作情绪，减少紧张，愤怒及懮伤。

sentences.english: Reduce edible salt bloats, smoke, barbecue food.
sentences.chinese: 减少食用盐腌，烟熏，烧烤的食物。

sentences.english: Moreover, differences also exist between the pitch radius increasing phases and pitch radius decreasing phases.
sentences.chinese: 此外，这种差异也存在于节径增加和节径减少阶段。

sentences.english: To reduce memory usage, start by identifying the largest consumers of memory.
sentences.chinese: 为了减少内存消耗，先要找出内存的消耗大户。

sentences.english: I also like that the tech is supposed to be durable, reducing e-waste.
sentences.chinese: 另外，这项技术是可持续耐用的，能减少电损耗。

sentences.english: These increases taper off after a time, though, unless they enter management.
sentences.chinese: 过了一段时间后加薪会逐渐减少，除非进入管理层。

sentences.english: Opposition politicians blame the government, saying a river project has reduced farmland.
sentences.chinese: 反对党的政治人物指责政府河川的计划使得农地减少。

sentences.english: Reduce the set cost of customers and increase the after-sales service guarantee.
sentences.chinese: 减少客户的成套成本，增加售后服务保证。

definition: to decline/to drop/to fall/to go down/to decrease
to avert/to prevent/to avoid/to refrain from
to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter
